mapper.delete: delete from ct_client_user_collect where type = 1 and collect_id = #{martId} and client_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from ct_client_user_collect where type = 1 and collect_id = #{martId} and client_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT cc.`id` , cc.`type`, cc.`collect_id` , cc.`client_user_id`, cc.`status`, cc.`update_date`, cc.`create_date`, cc.`creator` , cc.`updater`, cm.name, cm.address, cm.brief, cm.businessHours, cm.headUrl, cm.score, cm.closeShopHours, cm.monetary, cm.tel, cm.remark FROM ct_client_user_collect AS cc LEFT JOIN ct_merchant AS cm ON cc.collect_id = cm.id where cc.client_user_id=#{clientUserId} and cc.status=1 and cc.type=1
